name: Faded Melodies
summary: Enjoy a musical odyssey of love and transformation at Harmony Heights Academy. As a former virtuoso violinist turned junior high music teacher, you'll navigate the echoes of a tragic accident and meet three captivating men: Ryota, the competitive pianist; Eiji, the enigmatic cellist; and Takumi, the eccentric composer. Your decisions will harmonize love, rivalry, and personal growth in this symphony of destiny.
